thread.title: George, Barbara Bush receive standing ovation at Super Bowl 51

title: George, Barbara Bush receive standing ovation at Super Bowl 51
text:
Manage George, Barbara Bush receive standing ovation at Super Bowl 51 George Bush Sr. and wife, Barbara, were on hand for the coin toss Sunday at Super Bowl 51 in Houston. President Bush received an incredible ovation and many media members and Show All Slides Start Slideshow Next Slideshow 1 of 14 
George Bush Sr. and wife, Barbara, were on hand for the coin toss Sunday at Super Bowl 51 in Houston. 
President Bush received an incredible ovation and many media members and fans alike expressed their gratitude on Twitter:
